synopsis.text: All-powerful and dreaded sorcerer Zagan finds himself at a loss when it comes to matters of the heart. Spending his days honing his dark arts and warding off intruders, social interactions have always been a challenge for him. But when he encounters the stunningly beautiful elven slave, Nephelia, at a clandestine auction, he is instantly smitten. Compelled to have her, Zagan squanders his entire fortune to secure her freedom. Back at his castle, the awkward dance of love begins as the gruff sorcerer struggles to express his feelings and connect with his newfound companion. As they navigate their uncomfortable living arrangement, Nephelia's mysterious past and burgeoning feelings for Zagan only add to the complexity of their relationship. Will the unlikely pair overcome their awkwardness and find love in each other's arms, or will Zagan's fearsome reputation and Nephelia's troubled past prove insurmountable obstacles? Only time will tell in this enchanting tale of love, magic, and self-discovery.
